Title: App will not load
Review: I’m not sure what’s happened to this app, but the app will not load. I’ve deleted it and reinstalled it, but it still will not load. The app works fine if I click on a link and it opens in Instagram, but it will not launch/load when the app is opened from my phone.

The app works fine if I click on a link and it opens in Instagram, but it will not launch/load when the app is opened from my phone.
Need: Add or improve app troubleshooting and diagnostic features to help users identify and resolve issues causing the app not to load.

Title: Intrusive
Review: This app violates boundaries. I have notifications turned off on most apps; but even with notifications turned off on this app, it continues to have notifications on my Home Screen with the app and when I open up the app. The notification at times says “make sure to turn on notifications so you don’t miss out.” No. I have them turned off for a reason…why are you notifying me of something I don’t want to be notified of and have explicitly asked to not have notifications. This is annoying, unnecessary, and not a good look. Please change this as a way of demonstrating basic respect and an honoring of your users’ experience. Happy to change my review when these changes are made!
Title_and_Review: Intrusive This app violates boundaries. I have notifications turned off on most apps; but even with notifications turned off on this app, it continues to have notifications on my Home Screen with the app and when I open up the app. The notification at times says “make sure to turn on notifications so you don’t miss out.” No. I have them turned off for a reason…why are you notifying me of something I don’t want to be notified of and have explicitly asked to not have notifications. This is annoying, unnecessary, and not a good look. Please change this as a way of demonstrating basic respect and an honoring of your users’ experience. Happy to change my review when these changes are made!
Need: Add or improve a feature to fully respect user preferences regarding notifications, ensuring that if a user opts out of notifications, they do not receive any prompts or reminders about enabling notifications.

Overall I like this app but the update is not great at all. You can’t see the bottom of the videos and the sound on the videos is there sometimes, sometimes not, or I have to click up the volume once to get the sound to work. 
Very frustrating 😞

Title: stop the refresh
Review: i would rate the app 5 stars if everytime you left the app it didn't refresh back to the homepage. it makes me not even want to use the app especially because the point of linking the outfits is to purchase them/browse them on their website - that gets defeated when i return back to LTK and have to find the creator all over again because the app went back to the homepage. quite infuriating and i have closed the app in frustration multiple times because of this. its a small thing but super tedious once you've scrolled a long way to find stuff.
Title_and_Review: stop the refresh i would rate the app 5 stars if everytime you left the app it didn't refresh back to the homepage. it makes me not even want to use the app especially because the point of linking the outfits is to purchase them/browse them on their website - that gets defeated when i return back to LTK and have to find the creator all over again because the app went back to the homepage. quite infuriating and i have closed the app in frustration multiple times because of this. its a small thing but super tedious once you've scrolled a long way to find stuff.
Need: Add a feature to maintain the user's last viewed position in the app when they switch away and return, preventing automatic refresh to the homepage.

Title: Need To Fix Bugs

Title_and_Review: Need To Fix Bugs I love the idea of LTK. However, there are a few bugs that need to be fixed. When I click to follow someone, it does not save when I go back to the homepage and only two of the people appear. Also, the app is just very slow. Live LTK, but the app could use some improvement.
Need:
1. Improve the follow functionality to ensure it consistently saves user actions.
2. Optimize app performance to enhance speed and responsiveness.

Title: Keeps refreshing and losing place
Review: Every time I click on a link and then go back to my LTK feed it's now refreshing the entire feed and I lose my place! Even doing a specific search, if click on a link and go back to LTK, the app refreshes and takes me back to my feed, losing my search results and my place. This is making shopping the app incredibly frustrating!!

This is making shopping the app incredibly frustrating!!
Need: Add a feature to preserve the user's place in the feed or search results after clicking on a link and returning to the previous page.

Title: has a few issues
Review: i use LTK a lot and i love it! it has so much inspiration from so many creators and you can follow, like, and comment on posts. one of the issues i dont like is that some posts’s audio don’t work and it’s kinda annoying. one other kink I dont like is on the recommended home page, it always shows the most recent posts of creators that i follow, and it doesnt ever change (most of the time), so i basically have to look at the same stuff until someone posts again. also, if you click on a post, and you go to the account of the post, you cant swipe to see other posts by them. instead you have to leave that post and scroll to see other posts. im sure there are other things that bug me but I dont really remember rn so if u want fashion inspo I would just stick to Pinterest but that’s just my opinion !
Title_and_Review: has a few issues i use LTK a lot and i love it! it has so much inspiration from so many creators and you can follow, like, and comment on posts. one of the issues i dont like is that some posts’s audio don’t work and it’s kinda annoying. one other kink I dont like is on the recommended home page, it always shows the most recent posts of creators that i follow, and it doesnt ever change (most of the time), so i basically have to look at the same stuff until someone posts again. also, if you click on a post, and you go to the account of the post, you cant swipe to see other posts by them. instead you have to leave that post and scroll to see other posts. im sure there are other things that bug me but I dont really remember rn so if u want fashion inspo I would just stick to Pinterest but that’s just my opinion !
Need:
1. **Audio Issue on Posts**: There should be a feature to ensure all multimedia elements in posts, especially audio, function properly. This could include better quality checks or an option to report/fix audio issues on specific posts.
2. **Dynamic Content on Recommended Home Page**: Implement an algorithm or feature for more diversity in how content is displayed on the home page, possibly by incorporating personalized content algorithms that show a mix of recent and popular posts from both followed and unfollowed creators.
3. **Navigation among Multiple Posts from the Same Creator**: Include a feature that allows users to swipe through all posts by a creator directly from any of the creator's post pages, thereby enhancing user navigation and interaction with the content.

Title: The new update made the app unusable!
Review:
I updated the app that was working perfectly fine before I updated it. Now it closes automatically when I click on a link to shop for the items shared by influencers. 
This makes the app no longer useful. Sadly I don’t know if there are other apps I can use that are similar to this one and actually work. 
I will make the difficult decision of deleting the app and apparently erasing all my data.
